name: find-sequence-mutations
title: Find Sequence Mutations
description: Identify mutations by comparing query and reference sequences
content:
Overview

This application compares a query sequence against a reference sequence to identify all mutations.

Features

  • Position-by-position comparison
  • Standard mutation notation
  • Ignores gaps in alignment

Parameters

  • Query Sequence: Sequence to analyze for mutations
  • Reference Sequence: Wild-type or reference sequence
  • Query Start: Starting position (optional)

Output

Returns mutations in RefAA_Position_QueryAA format (e.g., A123T).
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/find_sequence_mutations.py "${querySequence}" "${referenceSequence}" --query-start ${queryStart} -o "${outputDir}"
